description: Get free HIV information today on 1190
title: Local HIV Testing & Counselling Hotline : call 1190
content:
LVCT provides infomation to callers on HIV, STIs in English and Swahili, through an anonymous and confidential, toll free, national hotline based in Nairobi, 7 days a week. Call  the LVCT Health Helpline on 1190.

You can also visit the LVCT website : [http://lvcthealth.org][1]


  [1]: http://lvcthealth.org
